name: Lost Me
description:
Ryuuga is back, he knows you're here, he knows you want to play with him...

and he knows you want to dig deeper onto his story

Lost me-, nearly nobody may remember his story, Ryuuga, a guy who had a terrible accident one night, he should deal with his condition while trying to recover and live a normal life...

That was the main story, but since he was just a demo, all of the game data was replaced in order to make an amazing story, including him

and now he wants to take on the full game
